00030 #ifndef __GLESSupport_H__
00031 #define __GLESSupport_H__
00032 
00033 #include "OgreGLESPrerequisites.h"
00034 #include "OgreRenderWindow.h"
00035 #include "OgreConfigOptionMap.h"
00036 
00037 namespace Ogre
00038 {
00039     class GLESRenderSystem;
00040     class GLESPBuffer;
00041 
00042     class _OgreGLESExport GLESSupport
00043     {
00044         public:
00045             GLESSupport() { }
00046             virtual ~GLESSupport() { }
00047 
00053             virtual void addConfig() = 0;
00054             virtual void setConfigOption(const String &name, const String &value);
00055 
00060             virtual String validateConfig() = 0;
00061             virtual ConfigOptionMap& getConfigOptions(void);
00062             virtual RenderWindow* createWindow(bool autoCreateWindow,
00063                                                GLESRenderSystem *renderSystem,
00064                                                const String& windowTitle) = 0;
00065 
00067             virtual RenderWindow* newWindow(const String &name,
00068                                             unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00069                                             bool fullScreen,
00070                                             const NameValuePairList *miscParams = 0) = 0;
00071 
00075             const String& getGLVendor(void) const
00076             {
00077                 return mVendor;
00078             }
00079 
00083             const String& getGLVersion(void) const
00084             {
00085                 return mVersion;
00086             }
00087 
00091             virtual void *getProcAddress(const String& procname) = 0;
00092 
00096             virtual void initialiseExtensions();
00097 
00101             virtual bool checkExtension(const String& ext) const;
00102 
00103             virtual unsigned int getDisplayMonitorCount() const
00104             {
00105                 return 1;
00106             }
00107 
00111             virtual void start() = 0;
00115             virtual void stop() = 0;
00116 
00117             virtual GLESPBuffer *createPBuffer(PixelComponentType format, size_t width, size_t height) = 0;
00118         private:
00119             String mVersion;
00120             String mVendor;
00121 
00122         protected:
00123             // Stored options
00124             ConfigOptionMap mOptions;
00125 
00126             // This contains the complete list of supported extensions
00127             std::set<String> extensionList;
00128     };
00129 
00130 }
